Package game.weapon

Class GreatKnife

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.weapon.TradeableWeapon
game.weapon.GreatKnife
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Weapon, Tradeable, Upgradable
public class GreatKnife
extends TradeableWeapon
implements Upgradable
A class representing a Great Knife weapon in the game. This weapon is tradeable and can be used by actors to attack enemies.
